name: clawbridge
description: Enterprise-grade Free AI bridge for OpenClaw (via Pollinations)

scripts.ui:build: cd web && npm run build && rm -rf ../public/* && cp -r out/* ../public/
scripts.ui:watch: nodemon --watch web --ext ts,tsx,js,jsx,css,json --ignore web/out --ignore web/.next --exec "npm run ui:build"

author: nezumi0627
